title: Best Practices for Creating Markdown Documentation for Your Apps
author: Damon M Garn
description: Markdown's simplicity makes it an excellent option for documenting projects. But Integrating Markdown into your documentation projects requires more than just selecting a version specification.
cntitle: 为你的应用创建 Markdown 文档的最佳实践
cndescription: Markdown的简单性使其成为记录项目的绝佳选择。但是，将Markdown集成到您的文档项目中，需要的不仅仅是选择一个版本规范。
